website_summaries.verdict: These durable bed risers are simple to use and constructed to last.
pros: Bed risers enable you to boost the height of a bed by 5.25 inches
Crafted from black plastic resin, guaranteeing the risers won't come apart on their own
Designed to fit a bed post up to 2.63 inches
More affordable than many similar risers
cons: Tend to stick out underneath a bed

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about a month to prop up my bed frame and they've held up so far. I'm not tiny and my lady friend is a giant amazon 6 foot+ freak of nature and the bed hasn't collapsed under the........*cough* 'stress' *cough* So far, so good. They're solid. I would recommend them if you need something that can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Morbidcorpse

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last more than 2 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these TWO weeks ago and today when my friend and I were sitting on my bed, TWO RISERS broke.The frame leg went right through the plastic top of the bed riser!! They need to make that part thicker or stronger. So bummed. The material of the riser isn't strong enough to support anything. We were just sitting here too, not jumping or anything. So disappointed. I'm choosing to get replacements this time, so hopefully this doesn't happen again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and breaks easily. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Broke in under 2-months with a sleeper that weighs barely a hundred pounds. Update: Customer Service was quick and responsive so I upgraded to a 3-Star.
customer_reviews.author: RCJR

customer_reviews.title: Quick & economical solution.
customer_reviews.text: I already had these kind of risers on the bed, then with recent knee replacement surgery, I used them on my sofa & easy chair. They make the lift to rise with the surgical handicap much easier. I have since taken them from under the chair, but we like the higher rise on the sofa so much they will remain. A bed skirt will cover the space from sofa to floor, & for seniors or recovering surgical patients it's so much more comfortabe.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Fredricksen

customer_reviews.title: No more low chairs to struggle out of
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these years ago to raise the height of a bed. They were not used for that purpose. After back surgery getting out of a chair that is low can be a struggle. These raise the chair to a height that is comfortable for me. My only complaint is that they are kind of unsightly under the legs of the chair. I fixed this by making a skirt that fits around the bottom of the chair and extends to cover the risers. Looks nice and works for me. Even if you don't sew, a staple gun can work. Now my matching chairs are equal height and my aging house guests are happy, too!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A Borst

customer_reviews.title: Reliable with repeated use
customer_reviews.text: These bed risers lift the bed up 6" to give plenty of space underneath and raise the bed up to a desirable height. With standard dorm bed frame and mattress if two average sized people stood next to the bed it would be about waist high. Bed risers are also sturdy enough and have enough traction not to slip or squeak if you attempt to move the bed around after being raised. Package shipped on time and in great shape. 1 month later review: Still holding up like day 1. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ciminello

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and I use risers in my classroom for a few of my tables. I purchased these risers for our home (master bed) and I am very pleased with the product. These risers feel very thick, which makes me feel comfortable in regards to the weight being put on them. Moreover, I was very pleased with the space at the top since it was big enough to fit the posts of our bed, which includes two wheels. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Owensbritt1

customer_reviews.title: Added height
customer_reviews.text: So far they are strong enough to suit my needs.. I got it for a glass top table I wanted to use as a bed side table instead of a coffee table .. needed height. I was a little Leary because they didn't seem very thick on the top.. and I was concerned about them supporting the weight. The other thing was how large width wise they are.. bulky.. and not very attractive.butfor now it's. Doing the job.. I can always paint them I guess
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks in and they are punctured and unusable. Only one teen girl sleeps in the bed (130lb female) and my 6lb chihuahua. She doesn't jump on the bed or even plop down. This is ridiculous. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Homer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but make sure you measure ahead
customer_reviews.text: So far about 2 month into use this has worked just fine for us. I did my home work and measured how much height I needed to add under the kid’s bed and the dimensions of the bed legs to make sure it fit. Some reviews mentions that it cracks but we haven’t had that issue. Our 7 year old jumps once in a while on the bed but so far it has not broken the product. Fingers crossed! One thing to note is that the base of the item takes up some space so you will lose some storage space under the bed but it’s minimal.
customer_reviews.author: YokT

customer_reviews.title: Good except...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a neat product. I wanted to use them for a dresser turned desk but when I got them, they were stained with something like coffee? Or French vanilla? It wasn’t a packaging issue because I know it was shipped in a box without anything else but I tried wiping it away with napkin and it just won’t budge. It smells like coffee and won’t wipe away and when i tried to ignore it, it made my entire room smell like that sweet smell. Overall they were decent, I probably would’ve kept them if they didn’t have this weird smell. But unfortunately I’ll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Sumaya Adel

customer_reviews.title: Good for more storage space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago for my amazon basics foldable metal bed frame. These work great for added storage space under your bed and for regular bed frames that only need 4 of these. However, I would not recommend using this with the bed frame that I have. The amazon basics fodable metal bed frame needs 12 of these and it is tricky getting them under the bedframe and it's difficult adjusting the bed frame from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Work well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap and they do the job. They match the other set I bought from IKEA last summer. Cons: They should sell them in packs of 6 or 7, so that you can support the middle beam. Also, there is a little lip on the bottom that prevents you from pushing them flush against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: They work just fine without issue.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because other buyers had pictures of cracked tops etc. I already had 4 that I purchased at an actual store a while back, and needed 4 more as supports under the bed for the legs. When they arrived I immediately put them under the bed. It has been almost a week and they are holding up as expected. They are durable and sturdy just like my older ones, and have increased my under bed storage dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: SouthLaneDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Just setting it up is hard and made me feel like I was going to hurt myself and if you ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it makes me feel unsafe in multiple ways. Just setting it up is hard and made me feel like I was going to hurt myself and if you don't have them situated right from the beginning or move the bed by accident and it falls off the legs the bed not only falls over onto you, but crushes anything underneath you had stored. Be very cautious.
customer_reviews.author: KkOk123

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! READ THE OTHER REVIEWS.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. I'd read the other reviews and thought my 14 year old daughter and a full-sized bed would be fine with them (Most of the other reviews are 2+ adults). She was on it, her 10 year old sister sat down next to her and ker-whump 2 risers bit the dust. We're talking the inner cup shattered. Even with Amazon's awesome exchange policy it's not worth the 10 bucks you save by not buying one of the solid risers instead. They didn't even last 5 hours before they broke. (and most of that was not spent near the bed)
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Broke soon after installation. Scared the bajezus out of me because I was in bed when the cheap china garbage decided to give way. I wasn’t committing any funny business or anything of the sort. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Stacked
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I didn't realize the mattress and box springs I ordered were deep enough to give me the height I wanted. Well, we put these on and then add the box spring and mattress, and since I am only 5ft tall I got not get up in the bed at all. They are sturdy and give you the height, but these were too high for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D B

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cheap - bed broke through it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter’s bed. She weighs no more than 40lbs, her bed is a double. The bed broke through the riser about a week ago, and it’s too late for a return. Very thin and cheap plastic. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Kitson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These just aren't very sturdy at all. They made my whole bed unstable and shaky so I took them off. They also feel cheap and flimsy, like one of them would snap in half if you put too much weight on the bed. They do raise the bed pretty high, but I felt like it was going to fall over if I breathed on it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how big they are and they're still quick-molded PVC. But they work and fro the price I'm okay with it. I'd probably want to spend more for a riser that doesn't look so cheap but I have a black frame bed and lots of oversize comforters so nobody notices too much. I'd go for a wood block riser if I had a wooden bed though.
customer_reviews.author: RobotMan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed so we can fit storage bins under the bed. Probably shouldn’t have put it down myself though because my back hurt from lifting my heavy bed and placing them under at the same time. Ask for help if you can if not just have some pain reliever ready :)
customer_reviews.author: Tracie2106

customer_reviews.title: "Dumb plastic things"
customer_reviews.text: This product is way to high in price, I got these same ones from big lots for 5$ for a set of 4 before I purchased these almost 30$ peices of plastic. I only had to purchase them because I needed them badly for my short furniture because my furniture was digging into my legs tearing my legs up, thanks to the short furniture they sell world wide people have to buy these "dumb plastic things".
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: I use them to raise my card table so when i do my jigsaw puzzles it doesnt hurt my back.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Maximize your under bed storage
customer_reviews.text: These help make so much more under bed storage! Easy to place. The bed is pretty high now with the risers and the mattresses so if you are shorter or elderly might not want to use them. So excited to organize u der the bed now!
customer_reviews.author: R. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fit totes under the bed
customer_reviews.text: These do the job. I can now fit a standard plastic tote under the bed. My 11 year old sleeps there so not much weight to speak of but they are holding up just fine with multiple people sitting on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Used to lift outdoor table off ground.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t buy for intended use but works the same. I needed to lift a plant table a few inches on my back patio and these worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Waite

customer_reviews.title: They hold up a two person wooden table with school ...
customer_reviews.text: They hold up a two person wooden table with school supplies piled on very well. You cannot slide the table on these bed risers across carpet without first removing the bed risers. I know this may seem obvious but my middle schoolers tried it .... disaster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Just picked mine up from Amazon locker and the box looked like it had been thrown and also the risers are chipped
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WHEN I SAT DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I broke one on Day One when I sat down on the bed. I'm 160 lb, so no, this shouldn't happen, and frankly, this is dangerous. This was pretty cheap, so I guess I'm not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great for lifting porch chair for elderly parent
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for making a porch chair that was too low become the right height. Now my elderly dad can enjoy being in his chair and is able to get out of it due to the height.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Buy them if you want to throw them right in the trash!
customer_reviews.text: These broke the second my husband sat on the bed with me. He is a very lean man at 135 lbs, I am 170. We have a regular full bed, nothing crazy heavy. I could understand maybe if we were rambunctious and the risers collapsed from that but this was just pathetic. Don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H

customer_reviews.title: These bad boys took my bed right up to the height ...
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys took my bed right up to the height I wanted. Now my bed is the perfect level I wanted off the ground. Works really well on the carpet in my room so not really sure how they are on hardwood, but I haven't had to worry at all about it sliding off the risers because of the depth on the top. Great way to give your bed a lift!
customer_reviews.author: TheBigRuby

customer_reviews.title: broke through
customer_reviews.text: One bed leg broke through after just a couple months of use. Single person, no extra curricular activities to cause stress to the riser. Broke through while I was sleeping. Unable to find contact info for company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: glad i bought them
customer_reviews.text: these bedrisers are great they hold up to 600 lbs or more made enough space for me to store things under my bed great item is all i have to say there just awesome
customer_reviews.author: JOHN BUGGEY

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My sons bed was wobbly because of a broken bed support, got these - they came super fast! and they are easy to use, sturdy, holds a good amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blalock Castillo

customer_reviews.title: They make you feel like you're on a king bed. Not a king-size, a king bed being high up!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these on for about a year-and-a-half, and they're very durable I've never had to worry about them since putting the bed on them. They're very strong and give you plenty of space underneath, although I don't store underneath, it is nice to have a bed so high.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt Honesty.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good :)
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 2 pieces of it for the top part of the bed to have a decline (better for sleeping) and it's been over a month and so far so good :) They take a little more space so it would be better if they were a little more compact. but i assume they are supposed to be bigger in size to hold the pressure/weight. So far it does the job :)
customer_reviews.author: Vafa

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Used for my twin girls’ full size beds (that have wheels on the frame without rolling around). Sturdy enough for them! I would be more apprehensive for someone weighing over 160+ pounds! Seems like they would crack/bed posts would come through the plastic! But they are fine for kids/small adults unless you add something inside the risers to produce more weight support!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTY CLIATT

customer_reviews.title: so far good.
customer_reviews.text: Some people said, it breaks. for me working fine. bought them for raising dining table bench. 3 people can sit on the bench, still not broken !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beds & Furniture
customer_reviews.text: These work great if you need to elevate a piece of furniture. It works great on beds as well. They have stood up over time. Monitor them when possible to ensure they are still serving its purpose and are aligned properly
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Were too tall for my bed slats so attempted to return. Was instead given a refund with no return required. Excellent seller commucation.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Furniture Savior
customer_reviews.text: work well to elevate my furniture not just my beds while my house was flooding with water, would highly recommend for use in elevating furniture. I flooded 6 inches last time and these would have been perfect, this time I flooded 2 inches and they worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These worked like a charm! I have created more space for storage and feel much better with less clutter. Now everything has a place and everything is in it's place. I will probably order more for my children's rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schmitten

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a mountain
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Gets the bed up so my dog can sleep underneath. Its also fun to watch my wife jump up to get into bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Classroom table risers - worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I teach 5th & 6th grade and have a few tables that are just too short for some of my kids to sit at comfortably. The tables aren't adjustable, so I thought I'd try bed risers. These work PERFECTLY! They're stable, don't shift, and accommodate my table's feet perfectly. I plan on buying another set soon for my other short table, now that I know these work so well!
customer_reviews.author: Malin Millar Freeman

customer_reviews.title: but sturdy and the area is big enough to set the ...
customer_reviews.text: These get the bed up high enough for me to use the room under the bed to store items. They are lightweight, but sturdy and the area is big enough to set the bedpost on, but has a lip so that it doesn't slip off. They are in my spare room, but that bed gets used quite a bit and I have had no problems and I love the extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bedker

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy, does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I can fit so much more stuff under my bed now. I’m very pleased. My bed frame has a lot of legs so I had to buy 12 and it was a little tricky but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Molenda

customer_reviews.title: NICE STURDY LIFTERS
customer_reviews.text: NICE STURDY LIFTERS, BUT, TOO TALL FOR ME ! I HAVE TO FIND SOMETHING ELSE TO PUT THEM UNDER !!!
customer_reviews.author: james f.

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding space under the bed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my sister who loves the added height for getting in and out of bed and extra storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Doris R

customer_reviews.title: Good riser
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. They are hosting my bed up. They work and hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: One of the risers were broken around the edge
customer_reviews.text: One of the risers were broken around the edge. They would probably still support the bed but could damage my floor. I'l be sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Owens

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: they are worth the money and do the job. not only for bed but other furniture as well
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Macheska

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They're nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They're nice and sturdy. I use them to raise the height of 6 foot folding tables for trade shows and they do the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lavanda brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for heavy wood table
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I used these to raise a large wood kid’s craft table to normal height, since the other option was to just get rid of the table. Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: busymommy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend unless your bed frame's legs are wide. The legs on our frame went right through these plastic stands.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel I.

customer_reviews.title: They work well and increase under the bed storage.
customer_reviews.text: They work well and increase under the bed storage. Update: We now have hardwood floors and I wonder if there is a product that will not scratch the floors???
customer_reviews.author: StephanieStuff

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These risers are very sturdy and perfect for lifting the bed in my son's bedroom. We jumped around on the mattress and it felt very secure with no fear of the wheels coming out of the risers. The height is perfect also! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieCTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.text: Have had these years & Amazon just now asking for review. Raises normal bed frame so storage totes fit below. 3 moves & still work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly sturdy and last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple sets of these maybe 5 years ago for my queen mattress. Ended up breaking one when I was rough housing with my dog, so now I've got a few extra.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Layton

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: They definitely raised the bed, however, two of them broke.....
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: My knees thank you
customer_reviews.text: As you can see these lifted my low bed to a more accommodating height, my knees thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David J Martin

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son has been using these for a while now to help with acid reflux. They work great. I ordered more for my bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: had to return because the bed was too high using them
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Swilley

customer_reviews.title: They lifted my bed
customer_reviews.text: They worked. Enough to give them five stars since that’s all I bought them for. Served their purpose
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: They’re bed risers
customer_reviews.text: These work as you’d expect them to normal bed risers nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: They don't make them like they used to I've already broken two of them
customer_reviews.author: John Ambrosek

customer_reviews.title: Great for raising the bed for acid reflux sufferers
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you need to raise your bed. We had to due to my husbands acid reflux. They are easy to install, and can hold alot of weight. Our king size bed is very heavy and these risers have no problem holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and broke
customer_reviews.text: Used for queen bed that only 1 adult sleeps on. Bed/ frame would lift if sat close to one end of the bed, so always had to be careful to get in bed from middle of bed length. 1 post cracked (leg went straight through the top) after ~1 month of use. 2nd one did the same after ~3 months
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and lightweight easy to slide under your bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and lightweight easy to slide under your bed frame
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy-lifts bed up pretty high
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but they made the bed way too high-error on my part, not products fault. Measure before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: They broke 2 weeks after I got them
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a set that had finally cracked after several years. I didn’t use these any differently and they broke 2 weeks after I got them. I’m going to spring for one of the more expensive sets on here that claim they never crack and I’d recommend others do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Croft

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the least amount of money. I needed an upolstered storage bench lifted a few inches, so my little white dog could see out the window. It worked and is sturdy enough for me (6’2” 250#’s) to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Greatly increased my storage space
customer_reviews.text: Lifts the bed high enough to get rolling storage boxes under the bed
customer_reviews.author: Lanita Longboy

customer_reviews.title: Does not accommodate different sized desk nor tables legs. Strong but not very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Opening too wide for small desk. Neither does not accommodate smaller nor narrower table legs. Not multifunctional.
customer_reviews.author: Fiveeggs

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a decade
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 10 years ago. Last month one failed so I bought another set.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Storage galore!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these bad boys no matter what. I love the height they give the bed and the added storage they provide. They are easy to use and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Ashbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Handy problem solver
customer_reviews.text: Works great to raise a too low bed. Made well so there is confidence you won't fall off or rather your bed won't.
customer_reviews.author: C. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for my queen bed rail set! Supports well
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Broke through after a week
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these bed risers. One has broke through just after a week. Very disappointed since others I bought from Walmart lasted for years
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! The bed now has plenty of room ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a second package because my friend gave me 4 free ones. I didn't realize I needed additional stackers for my king bed though. Just got these and put them up. I LOVE it! The bed now has plenty of room under for storage (which I hope NOT to need), and the raised bed makes the room look so much classier! I feel like a grownup! Left wheels on bed and fits fine! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Z!

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Makes getting out of bed easier- I’m a taller person, so it’s nice to just swing out of bed in the morning. I’m enjoying the new space for under bed storage too. They’re pretty utilitarian looking, but I’m not staring at my bed frame all day either.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased because the coffee table needed to be a little taller so that we could have storage containers underneath. These are very big for that table's legs but it does do the purpose until another option can be found.
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustMe

customer_reviews.title: Works for cribs
customer_reviews.text: We put these under my daughters crib so that it would be even with our bed. Easy to use and sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Allows for ample storage height; durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height and durable. I was also able to store a wheeled trunk under with these in use.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for less than 2 months and last night as I lay in bed reading my bed all the sudden jolted. The bed went right through the bed riser! I missed the return date by 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of lift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bed. Heavy duty and lots of storage now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Fittingoff

customer_reviews.title: Great height!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these so that we could put an air mattress under my sons bed so that when he had friends spend the night, bam!! We got bed!! It was the perfect height for a twin air mattress to fit under the bed. I liked the black because they don't stand out like the white.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Herbs

customer_reviews.title: Be careful buying hard plastics.
customer_reviews.text: They broke from the weight of my twin bed and the bed ripped over.
customer_reviews.author: Tammytelletrue

customer_reviews.title: What a great help for very low sitting furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the risers for my Mother . It makes it easier for her to get on and off both the couch and the chair in her family room.
customer_reviews.author: Fr. Mark Kotlarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Helped my back so much! Brought my sewing cutting ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped my back so much! Brought my sewing cutting table up to a height that worked for me :)
customer_reviews.author: shannon grenier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bed risers work well and I can now put my storage containers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Collins

customer_reviews.title: Worked how it should
customer_reviews.text: We don’t really use ours anymore. But worked as it was supposed to while we did.
customer_reviews.author: Jala

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them to raise my table for my bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: They are great! I have had them for about 4 months now and they are holding up just fine. Gave me extra storage space under my bed which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Viry B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to use and add great height to my bad frame giving it a more rich look.
customer_reviews.author: Dbazzarre

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I use them to elevate my college bed. They are extremely sturdy and lasted over 6 months so far and I’m sure they’ll last even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the princess and the pea feel for my bed and I think I might have gotten closer than I expected. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: This add high to my bed, with extra space for storage
customer_reviews.author: kathy ann

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: These riders fit the need, only downside is I have wood floors, the bottom has no rubber grip, so they move quite easily on my floors.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: Whitmor Bed Risers - Black (Set of 4)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Size:1Made from durable molded plastic, Whitmor bed risers add 5-1/4 inches to the height of your bed creating instant underbed storage. They come in a set of four and fit bed posts of up to 2.63 inches in diameter. Easy to use, simply place bedposts I the Recessed walls of the riser add 5.25 inch in height to the bed. Recessed walls fit up to 2.63 inch bed post and ensures that your bed will not slip and fall.
feature_bullets: Increase under bed storage by 5.25 inches
Easy to use; simply place under bedposts
Make room for storage bins to fit under the bed; store out-of-season clothing, extra bed linens, blankets and more
Dimensions: 6.375 L x 6.375 W x 6.0 H inches
Made of durable black plastic resin; add height to your bed without worry of the risers breaking
Recessed walls fit up to a 2.63-inch bedpost and ensure that your bed will not slip and fall
Bed risers may be stacked together when not in use to conserve space
For over 70 years, Whitmor has been bringing organization home. If you have questions or problems, please contact us for immediate assistance
